pages.text: Tamed Wolves are precious creatures; when their friend is in need, they are usually ready to help, even risking their own life.$(br2)When bound as a $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiar$(), wolves will increase the durability of $(l:bewitchment:poppets/poppet_practice)Poppets$().$(br2)Their protective spirit will also naturally increase the armor of their witch.
